greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sequence of coefficients arising in connection with a rapidly converging series for Pi.
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: Georg Fischer, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
M. Newman and D. Shanks, On a sequence arising in series for pi, Math. Comp., 42 (1984), 199-217.
Index entries for sequences related to the number Pi
Index entries for reversions of series
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 1, 0, SeriesCoefficient[ InverseSeries[ Series[ q Product[ 1 + q^k, {k, n}]^24, {q, 0, n}], x], {x, 0, n}]] (* _Michael Somos_, Sep 11 2011 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, polcoeff( serreverse( x * prod( k=1, n, 1 + x^k, 1 + x * O(x^n))^24), n))}
results.author: _Simon Plouffe_ and _N. J. A. Sloane_.
ext: Formula and more terms from _Michael Somos_, Nov 24 2001
